name: @cloudflare/kumo-figma
description: Figma plugin for generating Kumo UI Kit components

scripts.build: pnpm run sync:maybe && pnpm run build:data && pnpm run build:plugin
scripts.build:data: tsx src/build-theme-data.ts && tsx src/build-loader-data.ts && tsx src/build-phosphor-icons.ts && tsx src/build-figma-variables.ts
scripts.dev: pnpm run sync:maybe && pnpm run build:data && pnpm run build:plugin --watch
scripts.validate: pnpm --filter @cloudflare/kumo codegen:registry && pnpm run build:data && vitest run src/generators/drift-detection.test.ts
